issue.title: [C++] Adjust to new format for Substrait optional arguments
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17966](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17966). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Substrait is presumably going to change how it defines optional arguments in https://github.com/substrait-io/substrait/pull/342 .

This change will require a corresponding change in Acero (this should also bring Acero in line with Ibis & Isthmus).
